    Refrigeration Electrics (EL2)

    About this course:

    This course is designed to improve the learner’s knowledge of refrigeration system electrical wiring and motor control circuits.

    It is suitable for refrigeration technicians and other trades who need to understand how to fault find electrical circuits using citb construction skills logowiring diagrams.

    Duration: 2 days (12hrs CPD)

    Course Aims:

    On Completion of this course delegates should be able to:

    • Identify different motor controls
    • Test capacitors and motor windings
    • Test transformers
    • Read wiring diagrams
    • Fault find circuits

    Learning Agenda:

    • Electric circuit protection devices
    • Control Devices
    • Detection devices
    • Motor theory & Motor starters
    • Electrical circuits and wiring diagrams
